name: ExCEL - After School Program
description: The ExCEL Afterschool Program is run by the Chinatown YMCA. It is on-site and provides tutorial, enrichment, and recreational activities for students to extend their opportunity to learn and use English. The program is fee based but is subsidized for students who qualify. Hours: 2:55pm - 6:00pm, Wednesday: 1:40pm - 6:00pm Contact: Chinatown YMCA
